body:
Hi Everyone,

I've re-encoded all the audio files from the workshop because some people
had problems listening to them on windows PCs.  The new files play using
iTunes, quicktime or various other *good* media players on windows.  They
still don't play with windows media explorer (unless you've managed to
install the right codec).  I've also updated a few of the presentations
over the last couple of days.

The trouble with posting materials quickly is that revisions become
necessary...

Andy


On Mon, Sep 17, 2012 at 10:59 AM, Andrew McNeil <amcneil at lbl.gov> wrote:

-------------- next part --------------

subject: [Radiance-general] Almost live from Copenhagen
